channel.title: Portforwarding...the easy way!
channel.description:
MY Idea, i have not found this ANYWHERE else. I found this out screwing around with my computer! think of it what you want. but if this helped you, YOUR WELCOME :D REMEMBER - i was on the same boat as many of you, can't put up my server because the ports weren't forwarded, i then found this out, and now it works! [b]STEP 1[/b] Click The Start Button In The Start Menu, Click Connect to...SHOW ALL CONNECTIONS Right-Click The "Internet Connection" With The Globe In The Background && PC In Front! Click Properties... Click "settings" [b]STEP 2[/b] [u]PORTFORWARDING PRIVATE SERVER[/u] click "add..." Description of service: MOPAR Name Of IP Address: (YOUR LOCALHOST IP) Like...192.168.1.1 External Port: 43594 Internal Port: 43594 TCP: YES UDP: NO Click "Ok" [b]STEP 3[/b] [u]PORTFORWARDING NO-IP[/u] click "add..." Description of service: NO-IP Name Of IP Address: (YOUR LOCALHOST IP) Like...192.168.1.1 External Port: 8245 Internal Port: 8245 TCP: YES UDP: NO Click "Ok" [b]STEP 4[/b] Click "Ok" START YOUR NO-IP DUC! RECOMPILE AND START SERVER! [b][u]Remember to enjoy! :D[/b] [green]100%[/green] [red]Creds[/red] To [blue]Darque Star[/blue] (NOT LEECHED) :D FAQ - [b]How do i find out my ip?[/b] [u]click the start menu click "run..." in the text field put this in [/u]
cmd
[u] when the CMD comes up, type ipconfig and there you go![/u] [b]How do i portforward for hamachi?[/b] [u]You Dont Have To! This Is Already Portforwarded When You Download It![/u] QUESTIONS OR COMMENTS - REPLY :D OR EMAIL ME - joshownsyou@hotmail.com

item.title: Portforwarding...the easy way!
item.dc:creator: @Darque_Star Darque Star
item.description:
@Darque_Star wrote:

MY Idea, i have not found this ANYWHERE else. I found this out screwing around with my computer! think of it what you want. but if this helped you, YOUR WELCOME REMEMBER - i was on the same boat as many of you, can’t put up my server because the ports weren’t forwarded, i then found this out, and now it works!

STEP 1
Click The Start Button
In The Start Menu, Click Connect to…SHOW ALL CONNECTIONS
Right-Click The “Internet Connection” With The Globe In The Background && PC In Front!
Click Properties…
Click “settings”

STEP 2
PORTFORWARDING PRIVATE SERVER
click “add…”
Description of service: MOPAR
Name Of IP Address: (YOUR LOCALHOST IP) Like…192.168.1.1
External Port: 43594
Internal Port: 43594
TCP: YES
UDP: NO
Click “Ok”

STEP 3
PORTFORWARDING NO-IP
click “add…”
Description of service: NO-IP
Name Of IP Address: (YOUR LOCALHOST IP) Like…192.168.1.1
External Port: 8245
Internal Port: 8245
TCP: YES
UDP: NO
Click “Ok”

STEP 4
Click “Ok”
START YOUR NO-IP DUC!
RECOMPILE AND START SERVER!

[u]Remember to enjoy!

[green]100%[/green] [red]Creds[/red] To [blue]Darque Star[/blue] (NOT LEECHED)

FAQ -
How do i find out my ip?
click the start menu
click “run…”
in the text field put this in

cmd

when the CMD comes up, type ipconfig and there you go!

How do i portforward for hamachi?
You Dont Have To! This Is Already Portforwarded When You Download It!

QUESTIONS OR COMMENTS - REPLY OR EMAIL ME - joshownsyou@hotmail.com

Read full topic
